Package eu.amidst.core.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AmidstOptionsHandler
    This interface handles the different possible options or parameters.
    Vector
    This interface defines some Vector utility methods.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmidstOptionsHandlerStatic
    This class is just meant to serve as a temporary example to fill in options in STATIC CLASSES, that should "overwrites" the methods below, it will be removed in the future.
    ArrayVector
    This class implements the interfaces MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, and SufficientStatistics.
    BayesianNetworkGenerator
    This class defines a random BayesianNetwork generator.
    BayesianNetworkSampler
    This class implements the interface AmidstOptionsHandler.
    CompoundVector
    This class implements the interfaces MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, and SufficientStatistics.
    ConsecutiveSpliterator<T>
    Created by andresmasegosa on 16/12/14.
    FixedBatchParallelSpliteratorWrapper<T>  
    KeyCompoundVector<E>
    This class implements the interfaces MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, and SufficientStatistics.
    LocalRandomGenerator
    This class defines a local random generator.
    MultinomialIndex
    This class implements various useful methods for indexing arrays of distributions involving multinomial variables.
    OptionParser
    This class handles util methods related for parsing the options or parameters.
    ReservoirSampling
    Created by andresmasegosa on 10/12/14.
    Utils
    This class offers some AMIDST util methods.
